text:
Thank you very much for the wonderful project. I have implemented in my app it working great. Is there any way to change the error response format? That is, I need to change

`"error_description": "Invalid credentials given.",`

to 
`"detail": "Invalid credentials given.",`

Is there anyway to change the format? I already asked this question in stackoverflow, But I haven't got any response from there.
title: Is there anyway to change the error response format
clean_text: thank much wonder project I implement app work great Is way chang error respons format that I need chang Is anyway chang format I alreadi ask question stackoverflow but I havent got respons

text: What is the use case for this change?
